title: Nationwide manhunt for "cold-blooded" grandmother
text:
Nationwide manhunt for "cold-blooded" grandmother Tuesday, April 17, 2018 - 01:28 
Authorities are on a nationwide manhunt for 56-year-old grandmother Lois Riess from Minnesota who is wanted for two murders in two different states and was last spotted in Texas. Colette Luke has more. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Authorities are on a nationwide manhunt for 56-year-old grandmother Lois Riess from Minnesota who is wanted for two murders in two different states and was last spotted in Texas.
